By all accounts, BF3 campaign is not particularly good. It's a stellar online game and an average at best single player game. You cannot play true online with a game that has been pirated, so why waste your time? Go out and buy BF3. I did. As far as this game goes, I appriciate getting the file size down so much, but I cannot tolerate these sort of RTS games. I realize others like this genre, so good for them.
